810960.name: Battle Mix Secret Teachings
810960.description:
This bundle will add some new recipes for Battle Mix, release the limit on the Archeus Anima, and add the recipe to create Archeus Anima with synthesis.

A total of 11 new recipes can be learned, including the following:
- Triple Bomb
(Recipe overview)
Allows you to synthesize "Triple Bomb", which deals Fire, Ice, Lightning, and Air damage to a single enemy, with Battle Mix.

- Battle Impulse Incense
(Recipe overview)
Allows Suelle to synthesize "Battle Impulse Incense", which increases a target's Attack, Defense, Speed, and Equipment Effects, with Battle Mix.

- Miracle Box
(Recipe overview)
Allows Suelle to synthesize "Miracle Box", which greatly decreases the Attack, Defense, and Speed of all enemies, with Extra Mix.

- Blessed Goblet
(Recipe overview)
Allows Lydie to synthesize "Blessed Goblet", which activates a Time Card that recovers HP, with Extra Mix.

- Archeus Anima
(Recipe overview)
Allows "Archeus Anima", which is needed during Battle Mix, to be synthesized at the atelier.

and other.

*This content is also included in the "Atelier Lydie & Suelle Season Pass."
*This content will become available after "Extra Mix" is unlocked in the game.
810960.supported_languages:
英语, 繁体中文, 日语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
